ceo_buyer.justification: The contact person for Whitebark Energy is listed as 'Mark Lindh â€“ Chairman'.

interest_acquired_percent.justification: Whitebark is acquiring King Energy, which holds the interest in the project. 'King Energy is an Australian public unlisted company that hold a 70% (with an option to acquire the remaining 30%) interest in two Petroleum Exploration Licenses comprising 19,467 km2 in the Officer Basin, South Australia (Alinya Project).'

currency.justification: The document states 'The implied value of the acquisition is AUD$1,669,700' and 'all references to $ are in Australian currency, unless stated otherwise.'

cash_payments_raw.justification: The consideration consists of shares and options; no cash payment is mentioned in the transaction terms.

share_payments_raw.justification: Per the data extraction hierarchy, this field must be null because the number of shares and the price per share are provided separately and populated in their respective fields.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: Per the data extraction hierarchy, this field must be null because the number of shares and the price per share are provided separately, which takes higher priority for extraction.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: Whitebark will issue 100 million new Whitebark shares at a deemed issue price of $0.012 per share... as consideration for the acquisition of King Energy.

issued_share_price.justification: Whitebark will issue 100 million new Whitebark shares at a deemed issue price of $0.012 per share... as consideration for the acquisition of King Energy.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: No exploration commitment defined in meters was mentioned as part of the acquisition terms.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: No specific monetary exploration commitment was mentioned as part of the acquisition terms. The document states an intention to 'undertake a capital raising early in 2025 to provide funding for exploration activities' but this is not a term of the deal.

exploration_commitment_desc.justification: No exploration commitment was described as part of the transaction terms.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: No Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) or similar royalty was mentioned as part of the transaction terms.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The Alinya Project is described as 'two Petroleum Exploration Licenses comprising 19,467 km2 in the Officer Basin, South Australia (Alinya Project)'.

coverage_area_unit.justification: The Alinya Project is described as 'two Petroleum Exploration Licenses comprising 19,467 km2 in the Officer Basin, South Australia (Alinya Project)'.

resource_size.justification: This represents the Mid (P50) case for the Rickerscote Prospect, which is part of the Alinya Project. The resource table states: 'Rickerscote Prospect Resources... Mid (P50)... Hydrogen KG... 710 Million... Helium Bcf... 97'.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer is identified in the document as 'Whitebark Energy Limited (ASX:WBE)'.
